CustomField.formula: IMAGE( CASE(Origin, 'Email', '/resource/CaseListIcons/Email.png', 'Phone', '/resource/CaseListIcons/Phone.png', 'Web', '/resource/CaseListIcons/Web.png', 'Chat', '/resource/CaseListIcons/Chat.png', 'AP Retail (PM26)','/resource/CaseListIcons/APRetailPM26.png', 'Bulk Upload', '/resource/CaseListIcons/BulkUpload.png', 'Int Post (CN08)', '/resource/CaseListIcons/IntPostCN08.png', 'CCU', '/resource/CaseListIcons/CCU.png', 'CCU Bulk Upload', '/resource/CaseListIcons/CCU.png', 'Portal', '/resource/CaseListIcons/Portal.png', 'Social', '/resource/CaseListIcons/Social.png', 'IBIS', '/resource/CaseListIcons/IBIS.png', 'Prime', '/resource/CaseListIcons/Prime.png', 'Apple GCRM', '/resource/CaseListIcons/AppleGCRM.png', '/resource/CaseListIcons/Other.png'),'No Image' )
CustomField.label: Channel Image
